Posts.Content: RHENE wrote: I would like to ask for any suggestion and opinion on what we should do coz my mother-in-law (which we love so much) is now facing breast metastases. The cancer originally came from her breast 5 yrs ago and she undergone chemotjherapy and after that her bone scan resulted negative but now with so much pain in her hips, we decided to let her undego another bone scan and we found out that the cancer metastasize from her breast to her whole pelvic are, spinal column (cervical,thoracic,and lumbar), shoulder and skull. What shall we do? any suggestion or opinion will be highly apprecaited.thank you and God Bless. Log in to post a reply
